definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Of the use of advanced ultrasonic humidification humidification system.
sentences.chinese: 加湿系统采用先进的超声波加湿。

sentences.english: Doppler ultrasound is part of the echocardiogram test.
sentences.chinese: 也是超声波心动图检查的一个部分。

sentences.english: The results are published in the journal Cardiovascular Ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果公布在心血管超声波期刊上。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an apparatus using ultrasonic to atomize liquids to tiny particles.
sentences.chinese: 一种利用超声波将液体雾化为微小颗粒的装置。

sentences.english: Machine parts of irregular shape can be washed very clean by ultrasonics.
sentences.chinese: 用超声波能把形状不规则的机件洗得很干净。

sentences.english: Use of ultrasonic energy forces to dissolve CO2 into gas bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 利用超声波能将二氧化碳分解成气泡。

sentences.english: A new ultrasonic raging system applied in the mine detection robot is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述一种用于移动探雷机器人越障的超声波测距系统。

sentences.english: It adopts Aluminum pipe precise forming technology to guarantee ultrasonic welding steady and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 采用铝管精密成型技术，保障超声波焊接稳定可靠。

sentences.english: The acoustic principle of detecting flowrate and the level of material by ultrasonic is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍超声波流量计与物位计的声学原理。

sentences.english: Solidification degree of PETN composite explosive would affect ultrasonic attenuation.
sentences.chinese: 介绍泰安混合炸药固化程度对超声波衰减的影响。

sentences.english: The correlation between ultrasonic velocity and microstructure in 20G aged at high temperature is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了20钢高温时效组织与超声波速度间的相关性。

sentences.english: World crown ultrASonic wave electron plant.
sentences.chinese: 世冠超声波电子设备厂。

sentences.english: In the inner of shell there is ultrasonic transducer.
sentences.chinese: 外壳内侧固定设置有一个超声波换能器。

sentences.english: Set a two sides feed-in and feed-out devices and greatly reduce labor intensity.
sentences.chinese: 超声波清洗机设双面进出料装置，大大降低劳动强度。

sentences.english: The result indicated that the content of rhizoma polygonati polysaccharide is the highest by sonifier cell disrupter .
sentences.chinese: 结果表明超声波细胞粉碎仪提取的黄精多糖纯度最高。

sentences.english: It is proved that the length of damage relieving using ultrasonic is about 7cm.
sentences.chinese: 试验证明超声波解除地层堵塞的距离约为7cm。

definition: sonic location system (esp. underwater sonar)/acoustic positioning
Christian Johann Doppler, Austrian physicist who discovered the Doppler effect
